Hi all,

First of all, thanks for your great control, Radioman !

I try to databind markers to a datatable that contains lat and lng columns. How can I do this? Is somebody can post a code sample? I have read all discussions and search in the demo code, but no answer ...

Thank you.
if you use ObservableCollection just set map.ItemSource to it

Thanks for your quick answer.

OK, now, I have an ObservableCollection databinded on the map and the datagrid but when I sort data with the datagrid (with a click on the col header), all markers disappear!

Any idea ?

Solved with this :

Map.ItemsSource = from item in MarkersList select item;


DataGrid.DataContext = MarkersList;

where MarkersList is ObservableCollection.
